ResumeBuilderSystem.name: Resume Builder Job Board
ResumeBuilderSystem.description: A full-stack project that allows users to create, customize, and manage resumes. It includes a web interface, backend API, and a MAUI mobile app version.
features: AI-powered resume & cover letter generation (with prompt engineering)
API endpoints for resume parsing, JSON generation, and job matching
Containerized microservice setup using Docker and Docker-Compose
Data persistence using PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB
Modular architecture connecting MAUI app, Next.js web, and .NET API
Deployment of backend with live public API

AutomatedConnect4Game.name: Automated Connect 4 Game
AutomatedConnect4Game.description: An automated Connect 4 system integrating robotics and AI for real-time gameplay. Combines embedded hardware control, web-based interaction, and algorithmic decision-making.
features: AI-based game logic with adjustable difficulty levels
Motorized mechanism for automated token dropping
ESP32-hosted web dashboard for real-time control and visualization
Bidirectional serial and Wi-Fi communication between controllers
Hardware-state monitoring for fault detection and calibration
highlights: Implemented Minimax algorithm on Raspberry Pi Pico for AI gameplay
Integrated ESP32 web server for live game control via browser
Designed synchronized servo control for accurate token placement
Optimized communication between Pico and ESP32 for low-latency response
